text: jab ye us se mayoos ho gaye to tanhaai mein bait kar mashwera karne lage, un mein jo sub se bada tha us na kaha tumhe maloom nahi ke tumhare waalid ne tum se Allah ki qasam le kar poqta qaul qaraar liya hai aur us se pehle yousuf ke baare mein tum kotaahi kar chuke ho, pus main to is sar zameen se na talonga jab tak ke waalid sahab khud mujhe ijaazat na de ya Allah taâ€™ala mere is maamle ka faisla karde, wahi behetreen faisla karne wala hai
